meanings: (동물·생선을 잡기 위한) bait, (동물을 잡기 위한) decoy
(남을 꾀어내기 위한 수단·물건) bait, lure, decoy

examples.korean: A trap was laid, with fresh bait. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 새 미끼가 끼워진 덫이 놓였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A trap was laid, with fresh bait. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: As soon as I mentioned money he rose to the bait. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 돈 얘기를 꺼내자마자 그가 미끼를 덥석 물었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: As soon as I mentioned money he rose to the bait. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He baited the trap with a piece of meat. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그 덫에 고기 한 덩이를 미끼로 놓았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He baited the trap with a piece of meat. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This type of trap uses no bait or other attractant. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이런 유형의 덫은 어떤 미끼나 다른 유인 물질을 쓰지 않는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This type of trap uses no bait or other attractant. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The fish took the bait. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 물고기가 미끼를 물었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The fish took the bait. Add to Wordbook
